name: a drop of sky
description:
a drop of sky

by Jarod Pearce @JarodSwitz
with music by Danna Yun @Dyunster

This build is the product of a 13 week development cycle for uni. 

It plays as the beginning to checkpoint reveal.

After discovering the fish, you are free to explore within the boundaries , however there is no other content/scenes. Aproximate playtime is 5 -10 minutes.

This  is version 2 of a game currently under development.

After returning to their hometown, Maiden, a fictional fishing town set in rural coastal Australia, the protagonist discovers that all of the fish have disappeared from the waters. In a surreal twist, the protagonist begins to see fish flying through the air, only to discover that only they can see them. The player follows the protagonist's journey of change, as he uncovers the mysteries of the town, and the fish that follow him throughout it, learning from a diverse range of characters and how they deal with hardship themselves.

Please play with audio!

CONTROLS

This game is intended to be played with an X-BOX 360 controller. Game experience will be enhaced by doing so.
If unavabliable, keyboard controls bellow;

WASD - movement - LEFT THUMBSTICK
MOUSE - camera control - RIGHT THUMBSTICK
LEFT SHIFT - jog - RIGHT TRIGGER
'x' - x button - X BUTTON
'b' - a button - A BUTTON
esc  - start button - START BUTTON

OTHER CONTROLS

press 'm' at any time to return to menu
press 'r' at any time to restart a scene

mouse and keyboard bugs;
- when using the escape menu, the mouse is inaccurate over the buttons, please ensure that the desired button
is highlighted before clicking!

other things to note;
this game was built with 1920x1080 resolution in mind.
this game struggles with frames on low end PCs, make sure the game is played on a mid to high level device.
if whilst using a controller, a menu option cannot be selected or cycled through, please use the mouse

Thanks for playing!
